title: I Pretend To Be Broke, But I’m Not
itunes:title: I Pretend To Be Broke, But I’m Not
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been dating a woman for about a year and I’ve been keeping a big secret from her. The secret is I’m a wealthy man and my girlfriend doesn’t know. Before I met her and fell in love, I had met a lot of women that were attracted to me because I have a nice car, expensive watches and tailored suits. I have an apartment in the city and I started taking women there instead of to my home, because my house sits on a lot of acreage in a gated community in the suburbs...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been dating a woman for about a year and I’ve been keeping a big secret from her. The secret is I’m a wealthy man and my girlfriend doesn’t know. Before I met her and fell in love, I had met a lot of women that were attracted to me because I have a nice car, expensive watches and tailored suits. I have an apartment in the city and I started taking women there instead of to my home, because my house sits on a lot of acreage in a gated community in the suburbs...............
